GSD36visnu_iu:18: atas tv abhyeti tān eva Vi_20.32c
GSD36visnu_iu:65: annaṃ ca no bahu bhaved Vi_73.30a
GSD36visnu_iu:136: ākramya sarvaṃ tu yathā trilokīṃ Vi_99.6a
GSD36visnu_iu:146: ācāryas tv asya yāṃ jātiṃ Vi_30.46a
GSD36visnu_iu:183: ity evam uktā vasudhāṃ babhāṣe Vi_99.7a
GSD36visnu_iu:246: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ Vi_96.97c
GSD36visnu_iu:249: etaṃ yuvānaṃ patiṃ vo dadāmy Vi_86.16a
GSD36visnu_iu:302: kāntiḥ prabhā kīrtir atho vibhūtiḥ Vi_99.4c
GSD36visnu_iu:323: kuryād anyan na vā kuryān Vi_55.21c
GSD36visnu_iu:385: kṣīre tathā sarpiṣi śādbale ca Vi_99.14a
GSD36visnu_iu:413: gavāṃ hi tīrthe vasatīha gaṅgā Vi_23.61a
GSD36visnu_iu:448: gauḍī mādhvī ca paiṣṭī ca Vi_22.82a
GSD36visnu_iu:475: chatre ca śaṅkhe ca tathaiva padme Vi_99.12b
GSD36visnu_iu:529: tat tad asya vrateṣv api Vi_27.28d
GSD36visnu_iu:551: tathā suvarṇe vimale ca rūpye Vi_99.10a
GSD36visnu_iu:552: tathā sthitā tvaṃ varade tathāpi Vi_99.6c
GSD36visnu_iu:569: tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve Vi_72.7c
GSD36visnu_iu:605: tasmai na druhyet kṛtam asya jānan Vi_30.47d
GSD36visnu_iu:606: tasmai māṃ brūyā nidhipāya brahman Vi_29.10d
GSD36visnu_iu:613: taṃ ced rathaṃ nāpaharanti vājinas Vi_72.6c
GSD36visnu_iu:616: taṃ manyeta pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca Vi_30.47c
GSD36visnu_iu:625: tāsāṃ praṇāmaṃ satataṃ ca kuryāt Vi_23.61d
GSD36visnu_iu:662: tribhir eva tu yā bhuktā Vi_5.188a
GSD36visnu_iu:680: tvam eva nidrā jagataḥ pradhānā Vi_99.4a
GSD36visnu_iu:687: tvaṃ hi me paramā gatiḥ Vi_1.49b
GSD36visnu_iu:729: dīpte hutāśe vimale ca khḍga Vi_99.12c
GSD36visnu_iu:763: deśe na ca aśucau nārdre Vi_70.17c
GSD36visnu_iu:768: dehe kumāryāś ca tathā surāṇāṃ Vi_99.14c
GSD36visnu_iu:829: na gaur na narajā malāḥ Vi_23.40b
GSD36visnu_iu:832: na ca svargaṃ sa gacchati Vi_26.7d
GSD36visnu_iu:833: na ca havyaṃ vahaty agnir Vi_57.12c
GSD36visnu_iu:841: na tat putrair bhajet sārdham Vi_18.43c
GSD36visnu_iu:847: na tu tṛpyet svayaṃ tataḥ Vi_57.13d
GSD36visnu_iu:850: na dagdhaḥ sarvathā yas tu Vi_11.8c
GSD36visnu_iu:891: na homā na punar japāḥ Vi_20.45b
GSD36visnu_iu:892: na hy anyā niṣkṛtis teṣāṃ Vi_34.2c
GSD36visnu_iu:975: panthā deyā nṛpas tv eṣāṃ Vi_63.50c
GSD36visnu_iu:1020: pitrā bhuktaṃ tu yad dravyaṃ Vi_5.187a
GSD36visnu_iu:1032: punar mām ity ṛcaṃ japet Vi_28.51d
GSD36visnu_iu:1059: pṛcchāmy ahaṃ te vasatiṃ vibhūteḥ Vi_99.6d
GSD36visnu_iu:1156: bahu deyaṃ ca no 'stv iti Vi_73.28d
GSD36visnu_iu:1205: bhayād vā pātayed yas tu Vi_11.9a
GSD36visnu_iu:1215: bhuktaṃ samyag yadā tu yat Vi_5.186b
GSD36visnu_iu:1217: bhuktyā prāptaṃ hi tasya tat Vi_5.187d
GSD36visnu_iu:1232: bhūr bhuvaḥ svar itīti ca Vi_55.10d
GSD36visnu_iu:1292: mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan Vi_86.16d
GSD36visnu_iu:1298: mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhir Vi_86.16c
GSD36visnu_iu:1299: māṃ brūyā avīryavatī tathā syām Vi_29.9d
GSD36visnu_iu:1303: māṃsāni ca na khāded yas Vi_51.76c
GSD36visnu_iu:1360: yat sūtraṃ yā ca mekhalā Vi_27.28b
GSD36visnu_iu:1379: yad dūraṃ yac ca duṣkaram Vi_95.16b
GSD36visnu_iu:1382: yad yat parebhyas tv ādadyāt Vi_52.15a
GSD36visnu_iu:1387: yad vā tad vā paradravyam Vi_44.44a
GSD36visnu_iu:1392: yam eva vidyāḥ śucim apramattaṃ Vi_29.10a
GSD36visnu_iu:1400: yas te na druhyet katamac ca nāha Vi_29.10c
GSD36visnu_iu:1444: yo daṇḍo yac ca vasanaṃ Vi_27.28c
GSD36visnu_iu:1448: yo 'nne śuciḥ sa hi śucir Vi_22.89c
GSD36visnu_iu:1458: rajo bhūr vāyur agniś ca Vi_23.52c
GSD36visnu_iu:1480: lakṣmīr dhṛtiḥ śrīr viratir jayā ca Vi_99.4b
GSD36visnu_iu:1482: lakṣmīḥ karīṣe praṇatau ca dharmas Vi_23.61c
GSD36visnu_iu:1497: vane ca vatse ca śiśau prahṛṣṭe Vi_99.17c
GSD36visnu_iu:1509: vasāmy athārke ca niśākare ca Vi_99.9a
GSD36visnu_iu:1518: vākyais tu yair bhūmi tavābhidhāsye Vi_19.24c
GSD36visnu_iu:1520: vāje vāja ity ca tato Vi_73.32a
GSD36visnu_iu:1543: vidyā ha vai brahmaṇam ājagāma Vi_29.9a
GSD36visnu_iu:1551: vinā vā tair gṛhe vasan Vi_57.15b
GSD36visnu_iu:1653: śudhyeran strī ca śūdraś ca Vi_62.9c
GSD36visnu_iu:1670: śocadbhir atha vā na vā Vi_20.31d
GSD36visnu_iu:1676: śraddhā ca no mā vyagamad Vi_73.28c
GSD36visnu_iu:1687: śriyā yutaṃ taṃ pravadanti santaḥ Vi_99.8b
GSD36visnu_iu:1705: sa jīvaṃś ca mṛtaś caiva Vi_51.68c
GSD36visnu_iu:1719: sadyaḥ kṛte cāpy atha gomaye ca Vi_99.11a
GSD36visnu_iu:1726: sa phalaṃ pretya ceha ca Vi_58.12d
GSD36visnu_iu:1741: sarasvatī vāg atha pāvanī ca Vi_99.4d
GSD36visnu_iu:1779: sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmī Vi_72.7d
GSD36visnu_iu:1808: saṃsmāraṇe cāpy atha yatra cāhaṃ Vi_99.8c
GSD36visnu_iu:1860: stokā vā yadi vā bahu Vi_5.184d
GSD36visnu_iu:1872: sthitā sadā tac chṛṇu lokadhātri Vi_99.8d
GSD36visnu_iu:1876: sthitiḥ sudīkṣā ca tathā sunītiḥ Vi_99.5b
GSD36visnu_iu:1902: svāhā ca medhā ca tathaiva buddhiḥ Vi_99.5d
